roleset.name: come up with a new idea

example.name: the one example
example.text: We innovated telephone redemptions, daily dividends, total elimination of share certificates and the constant $1 pershare pricing, all of which were painfully thought out and not the result of some inadvertence on the part of the SEC.
example.arg: telephone redemptions, daily dividends, total elimination of share certificates and the constant $1 pershare pricing, all of which were painfully thought out and not the result of some inadvertence on the part of the SEC

roleset.note: Member of Vncls establish-55.5. Checked by Julia, 10/2010.

predicate.note: Frames file for 'innovate' based on sentences in financial subcorpus.
